availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John R. Graham (Frankfort, Kentucky, grocer and judge)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, grocer and judge. Kentucky native. Married Margaret E. Graham. Father of Charles G. Graham, Finnie Graham, Judson Graham, Rowan Graham, Weyland Graham, Harvey Graham, and Frank Graham. Grocer in Frankfort in 1860. Presiding Judge of the Franklin County Court in 1863. Police Judge of Franklin County in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 97; U.S. Mortality Schedules (1880), Kentucky, Franklin County, p. 2; KYR-0001-004-0022; KYR-0001-007-0364; KYR-0001-004-0077; KYR-0001-004-0078.
